guide.title: Xorg-server 1.10 Upgrade Guide
guide.abstract: This guide shows you how to upgrade the X.org server to version 1.10.

ul.li: Xorg no longer does autodetect devices using xf86-input-keyboard and xf86-input-mouse. If you want your input devices hotplugged, please migrate your settings to the xf86-input-evdev driver.

body.p: The configuration of xorg-server-1.9 is still valid for 1.10, and does not require any modifications to work with the new version.

Remember to read respective older guides in between this version and older version you are migrating from. E.g.: If you're upgrading from xorg-server-1.7, then you should read the xorg-server-1.8 and xorg-server-1.9 migration guides first.
Links to all guides are availible on our project page.
